title: Alleged image of Carl Pei holding the Nothing phone shows little more than nothing
content:
We may now have our first image of the upcoming Android phone from Nothing – the brand’s next step after its Ear 1 wireless earbuds – in the hands of company founder Carl Pei.

more…

The post Alleged image of Carl Pei holding the Nothing phone shows little more than nothing appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: We may now have our first image of the upcoming Android phone from Nothing in the hands of company founder Carl Pei.
